title: Andrew Carnegie
description: Andrew Carnegie rose up from humble origins to dominate the U.S. steel industry and become one of the greatest philanthropists of all time. In Andrew Carnegie students will learn about the life of this generous man and how his legacy lives on in his libraries and organizations. The book can also be used to teach students how to identify cause-and-effect relationships and to use hyphenated compound adjectives.
